verses.name: Joshua 10:40
verses.text: So Joshua smote all the country of the hills, and of the south, and of the vale, and of the springs, and all their kings: he left none remaining, but utterly destroyed all that breathed, as the Lord God of Israel commanded.

verses.name: Joshua 10:41
verses.text: And Joshua smote them from Kadesh–barnea even unto Gaza, and all the country of Goshen, even unto Gibeon.

verses.name: Joshua 10:42
verses.text: And all these kings and their land did Joshua take at one time, because the Lord God of Israel fought for Israel.

verses.name: Joshua 10:43
verses.text: And Joshua returned, and all Israel with him, unto the camp to Gilgal.
